pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing suspension
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:0.4: 1. The training rule on emission of semen
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:0.5: Venerables, these thirteen rules on suspension come up for recitation.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.2: At that time Venerable Seyyasaka was dissatisfied with the spiritual life,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.3: and he became thin, haggard, and pale, his veins protruding all over his limbs.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.4: Venerable Udāyī saw him in this condition and said to him,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.6: Are you perhaps dissatisfied with the spiritual life?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.8: “Well then, eat as much as you like, sleep as much as you like, and bathe as much as you like.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.9: And whenever you become discontent and sensual desire overwhelms you, emit semen with your hand.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.12: Then Seyyasaka ate, slept, and bathed as much as he liked,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.13: and whenever he became discontent and sensual desire overwhelmed him, he emitted semen with his hand.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.14: After some time Seyyasaka became satisfied, and he had a good color, with a bright face and clear skin.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.15: Monks who were his friends said to him,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.16: “Seyyasaka, you used to be thin, haggard, and pale, your veins protruding all over your limbs.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.17: But now you’re satisfied, and you have a good color, with a bright face and clear skin.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.20: I just eat, sleep, and bathe as much as I like,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.21: and whenever I become discontent and sensual desire overwhelms me, I emit semen with my hand.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.1: “Do you eat the food given in faith with the same hand you use to emit semen?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.3: The monks of few desires complained and criticized him,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.4: “How can Venerable Seyyasaka emit semen with his hand?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.5: They rebuked Seyyasaka in many ways and then told the Buddha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.6: The Buddha then had the Sangha gathered and questioned Seyyasaka:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.7: “Is it true, Seyyasaka, that you emit semen with your hand?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.10: “Foolish man, it’s not suitable, it’s not proper, it’s not worthy of an ascetic, it’s not allowable, it’s not to be done.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.11: How can you emit semen with your hand?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.12: Haven’t I given many teachings for the sake of dispassion, not for the sake of passion;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.13: for freedom from bondage, not for the sake of bondage;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.14: for the sake of non-grasping, not for the sake of grasping?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.15: When I’ve taught like this, how can you be intent on passion, bondage, and grasping?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.16: Haven’t I given many teachings for the fading away of sensual desire, for the clearing away of intoxication, for the removal of thirst, for the uprooting of attachment, for the cutting off of the round of birth and death, for the stopping of craving, for fading away, for ending, for extinguishment?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.17: Haven’t I given many teachings the abandoning of worldly pleasures, the full understanding of the perceptions of worldly pleasure, the removal of thirst for worldly pleasures, the elimination of thoughts of worldly pleasures, the stilling of the fever of worldly pleasures?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.18: Foolish man, This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it or increase the confidence of those who have it,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.19: but it will hinder confidence in those without it, and it will cause some with confidence to change their minds.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.20: Then, after rebuking Seyyasaka in many ways for being difficult to support …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.21: the Buddha said, “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.22.1: ‘Intentional emission of semen is an offense entailing suspension.’”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.23: In this way the Buddha laid down this training rule for the monks.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.1: At one time monks ate fine foods, fell asleep without mindfulness and clear awareness,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.4: “The Buddha has laid down a training rule
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.5: that intentional emission of semen is an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.6: We had an emission of semen while dreaming,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.8: Could it be that we’ve committed an offense entailing suspension?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.12: And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.13.1: ‘Intentional emission of semen, except while dreaming, is an offense entailing suspension.’”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.2: knowing, perceiving, having intended, having decided, he transgresses.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.4: there are ten kinds of semen:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.5: blue, yellow, red, white, the color of buttermilk, the color of water, the color of oil, the color of milk, the color of curd, the color of ghee.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.7: making it move from its base—this is what is meant by “emission”.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.9: apart from that which occurs while dreaming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.11: only the Sangha gives probation for that offense, sends back to the beginning, gives the trial period, and rehabilitates—not several monks, not an individual. Therefore it is called “an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.12: This is the name and designation of this class of offense. Therefore, too, it is called “an offense entailing suspension”.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.1: One emits with one’s own body;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.2: one emits with an external body;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.3: one emits both with one’s own body and with an external body;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.4: one emits shaking the pelvis in the air.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.5: When it is stiff through sensual desire one emits;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.6: when it is stiff because of feces one emits;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.7: when it is stiff because of urine one emits;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.8: when it is stiff through wind one emits;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.9: when it is stiff because of being stung by caterpillars one emits.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.10: One emits for the sake of health;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.11: one emits for the sake of pleasure;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.12: one emits for the sake of medicine;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.13: one emits for the sake of a gift;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.14: one emits for the sake of merit;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.15: one emits for the sake of sacrifice;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.16: one emits for the sake of heaven;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.17: one emits for the sake of seed;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.18: one emits for the sake of investigating;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.19: one emits for the sake of fun.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.24: one emits the color of buttermilk;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.25: one emits the color of water;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.26: one emits the color of oil;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.27: one emits the color of milk;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.28: one emits the color of curd;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.1.29: one emits the color of ghee.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.4: with an external physical body, whether organic or inorganic.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.5: Both with one’s own body and with an external body:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.7: Shaking the pelvis in the air:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.8: when one makes an effort in the air, the penis becomes erect.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.9: When it is stiff because of sensual desire:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.10: for one oppressed by sensual desire, the penis becomes erect.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.11: When it is stiff due to feces:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.12: for one oppressed by feces, the penis becomes erect.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.13: When it is stiff due to urine:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.14: for one oppressed by urine, the penis becomes erect.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.15: When it is stiff because of wind:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.16: for one oppressed by wind, the penis becomes erect.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.17: When it is stiff because of being bitten by caterpillars:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.18: when bitten by caterpillars, the penis becomes erect.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.25: For the sake of a gift:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.36: thinking, “Will it be blue? Will it be yellow? Will it be red? Will it be white? Will it be the color of buttermilk? Will it be the color of water? Will it be the color of oil? Will it be the color of milk? Will it be the color of curd? Will it be the color of ghee?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.1: If, with his own body, he intends, and he makes an effort, and semen is emitted, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.2: If, with an external body, he intends, and he makes an effort, and semen is emitted, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.3: If, both with his own body and an external body, he intends, and he makes an effort, and semen is emitted, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.4: If, shaking the pelvis in the air, he intends, and he makes an effort, and semen is emitted, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.5: If, when it is stiff because of sensual desire, he intends, and he makes an effort, and semen is emitted, he commits an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.8: If, when it is stiff because of wind, he intends, and he makes an effort, and semen is emitted, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.9: If, when it is stiff because of being bitten by caterpillars, he intends, and he makes an effort, and semen is emitted, he commits an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.7.1: If he intends for the sake of health and blue, and he makes an effort, and semen is emitted, he commits an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.1: If he intends, and he makes an effort, and semen is emitted, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.2: If he intends, and he makes an effort, but semen is not emitted, he commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.3: If he intends, but he does not make an effort, yet semen is emitted, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.4: If he intends, but he does not make an effort, nor is semen emitted, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.5: If he does not intend, but he makes an effort, and semen is emitted, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.6: If he does not intend, but he makes an effort, yet semen is not emitted, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.7: If he does not intend, nor does he makes an effort, yet semen is emitted, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.8: If he does not intend, nor does he makes an effort, nor is semen emitted, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.11: if he is not aiming at emission;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.14: if he is overwhelmed by pain;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.15: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.1.1: On one occasion a monk had an emission of semen while dreaming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.1.3: “The Buddha has laid down a training rule. Could it be that I’ve committed an offense entailing suspension?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.1.4: He told the Buddha, who said,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.1.5: “There’s no offense since it occurred while dreaming.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.2.1: On one occasion a monk was defecating, and semen was emitted.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.2.5: “There’s no offense if one isn’t aiming at emission.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.2.6: On one occasion a monk was urinating, and semen was emitted.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.2.8: “There’s no offense if one isn’t aiming at emission.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.3.1: On one occasion a monk was thinking a sensual thought, and semen was emitted.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.3.3: “There’s no offense for one thinking a sensual thought.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.4.1: On one occasion a monk was bathing in warm water, and semen was emitted.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.4.5: “There’s no offense if one isn’t aiming at emission.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.4.6: On one occasion a monk, aiming at emission, bathed in warm water, and semen was emitted.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.4.9: On one occasion a monk, aiming at emission, bathed in warm water and semen was not emitted.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.5.1: At one time a monk had a sore on his penis.
